A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It boggles my mind that anyone can find this movie entertaining.  It's a bad movie in general\, and an absolutely horrible Star Wars film.  Illogical plot and characters\, inane dialogue\, an almost petulant disrespect for the saga it is supposed to be working towards concluding.  A few ideas that could have been interesting\, but the flopped comedic attempts\, wasted character interactions\, and frightfully dumb plot arcs (among other things) propel this movie straight into the waste bin.
